div.p: This project allows to open and work with Maven projects in the Netbeans IDE. Mevenide currently supports NetBeans 4.0 and upcoming 4.1.
Mevenide for the 4.0 version and upcoming 4.1 version contains these features .
You can download the 0.6 release. It was tested with Maven 1.0.2 and Netbeans IDE 4.0 final and 4.1 beta.

Reasonable effort is made to have it always working with the latest development builds of Netbeans 4.1. Please note that the grammar module (editor completion for maven xml files) in 0.6 release zip will work with the 4.0 but to get it working with 4.1 beta you need the updated 4.1 nbm .
To get the latest Netbeans builds, go to the download page
